definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

pinyin: zi4 dong4 she4 xian4 she4 ying3

sentences.english: They're weighed and fed automatically into mixers.
sentences.chinese: 用料稱好重量之後，被自動送入攪拌機中。
第二，羅克維爾自動動力系統。
宏正自動科技是埃及爲太陽。

sentences.english: Engine room machinery and equipment, electrical and automatic machinery.
sentences.chinese: 機房機械設備，電器及自動化機械。

sentences.english: Single gray if better with automatic clearance.
sentences.chinese: 單機如果能帶自動清灰灰更好。

sentences.english: An automatic software-development technique of interactive interface for intelligent instruments is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種智能儀表交互界面的軟件開發自動化技術。

sentences.english: Program auto-color into 3 columns in the sheet.
sentences.chinese: 程序自動色爲3個工作表中的列。

sentences.english: When the terminal has an alarm, the terminal will automatically transmit the location information to the management center.
sentences.chinese: 終端出現警情時，終端自動將位置信息傳給管理中心。

sentences.english: The sprinklers will remain off when it rains.
sentences.chinese: 下雨的時候，灑水器會自動關閉。

sentences.english: And it illustrates the larger trend of home automation that is catching on among do-it-yourselfers.
sentences.chinese: 這說明家庭自動化的大趨勢就是自己動手。

sentences.english: In many countries, it also sets itself automatically to summer and winter time.
sentences.chinese: 在許多國家，它本身也設置自動夏季和冬季。

sentences.english: Thus parts sequences of subassemblies can be automatically planned.
sentences.chinese: 由此，完成子裝配體內零件的自動順序規劃。

sentences.english: Search results will also automatically when you search in the Omnibox.
sentences.chinese: 當你在搜索框內搜索時，結果也將是自動呈現。

sentences.english: Opening the door in an emergency will automatically  inflate the evacuation slides.
sentences.chinese: 打開緊急出口的門會自動充氣逃離滑梯。

sentences.english: At last, the basic principle of wide-range temperature operation and automatic temperature control system are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對寬溫工作的基本方法和自動控制系統給予了分析。

sentences.english: Specify download quota for automatic retrievals.
sentences.chinese: 指定下載配額爲自動檢索。

definition: to make a choice (between several alternatives)/a choice/an option/an alternative
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
at any time/at all times/at the right time
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
